Package com.erkanerol.network

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageProcessor
    thread used to read an event coming from a client and call the event listener
    NetworkListener
    thread that listens a server socket and create new threads for incoming messages
    NetworkManager
    a manager class that coordinates all components about network
    Peer
    a class used to represent an instance of the manager in the network
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NetworkException
    exception used to handle network problems
